message:
Anybody know if the TWiT artwork is available online in large resolution?
I'm thinking of the logo, and the individual show artwork, like say this of net@night: http://twit.tv/files/imagecache/coverart/coverart/podcast_3_3.jpg

(And large would be something like 1600x1200 and up)
I'd like to see something sleek and intelligent.
I don't like the Twit artwork logo.
